## PolyAsyncIterable.toMap() method

Return a `Map` made from the entries of `this`<!-- -->. This method is roughly equivalent to calling `new Map(iter.toArray())`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toMap<K, V>(this: PolyAsyncIterable<[K, V] | readonly [K, V]>): Promise<Map<K, V>>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

this


</td><td>

[PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md)<!-- -->&lt;\[K, V\] \| readonly \[K, V\]&gt;


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Map&lt;K, V&gt;&gt;

A promise to a `Map` composed of the entries yielded by this iterable.

## Remarks

This method is only available for iterations of pairs where the first component is a valid object key type.
